content:
For the 3rd time, the example modifier extension has bee superceded by the specification. The current example says:

There's no element on MedicationRequest to write an "anti-prescription"

well, that's a fail now.

I see that we define 4 modifier extensions in the spec:

  • http://build.fhir.org/extension-capabilitystatement-
    prohibited.html

  • http://build.fhir.org/extension-questionnaire-optionexclusive.html

  • http://build.fhir.org/extension-questionnaire-usagemode.html
  • http://build.fhir.org/extension-request-donotperform.html

That is 1 on capabilitystatement, 2 on questionnaire, 1 on a pattern that is taken up on NutritionOrder

Any preferences which I should use for the rewritten example?
btw, I think the 2 questionnaire extensions are not modifiers by our current definition - GF#19377
NutritionOrder.request-donotperform would probably be the best example. Regretfully agree on the 2 questionnaire ones.
